description:
looks easy enough- generate an offline wallet- but the instructions are opaque AF. open what btc wallet? there is no menu 

Open Your Bitcoin Wallet

Select: Help > Debug window > Console

Enter: importprivkey 23523234234234324fakebtcaddress PaperWallet

Wait for the import/rescan to complete and then restart the wallet
